product_name: e.l.f. CosmeticsStay All Night Micro-Fine Setting Mist
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganThe e.l.f. Cosmetics Stay All Night Micro-Fine Setting Mist is a lightweight makeup setting spray with up to 16 hours of wear.
details: DetailsBenefitsLocks on makeup for up to 16 hours of wearInfused with Cucumber Fruit Extract, Aloe, and Green Tea Leaf Extract to help hydrate and soothe the skinFeatures new micro-fine mister for ultimate coverage and easy applicationFor all skin typeProud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide. Because kindness is chic.Formulated WithoutAll e.l.f. products are free from phthalates, parabens, nonylphenol ethoxylates, triclosan, triclocarban, and hydroquinoneAll skincare is also free from sulfatesItem 2567177How To UseShake bottle well before each use. It is normal for formula to settle; the mixing ball will help evenly redistribute the formula. Hold 8-10 inches away from face. Close eyes and mist the face 2-4 times in a ''Z'' formation. For best results, use with the e.l.f. Poreless Putty Primer followed by their Flawless Finish Foundation.Due to nature of the formula, some clogging might occur. Run mister under warm water to release formula.Precautions: External use only. Stop use if signs of irritation. Close eyes when applying.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Alcohol Denat., Acrylates Copolymer, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butylene Glycol, Coceth-7, PPG-1-PEG-9 Lauryl Glycol Ether, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Silica, Hydroxyacetophenone, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Disodium EDTA, Tromethamine.
how_to_use: Shake bottle well before each use. It is normal for formula to settle; the mixing ball will help evenly redistribute the formula. Hold 8-10 inches away from face. Close eyes and mist the face 2-4 times in a ''Z'' formation. For best results, use with the e.l.f. Poreless Putty Primer followed by their Flawless Finish Foundation.Due to nature of the formula, some clogging might occur. Run mister under warm water to release formula.Precautions: External use only. Stop use if signs of irritation. Close eyes when applying.

reviews.headline: stopped working
reviews.comments: Its a pretty good product but the spray part of it stopped working with still half of the product left in the bottle

reviews.headline: somewhat good
reviews.comments: spray good perfect, it just doesn't make your makeup last

reviews.headline: I would Absolutely buy this product again. It works wonderfu
reviews.comments: Literally laugh all day. It does wonders with just a few sprays. It's such a good brand literally last all day all night will absolutely purchase this again. Elf is a very good brand. I use most of the brand or all my make up use as well as brushes. It's the best.

reviews.headline: Stopped working
reviews.comments: This setting spray was a birthday gift and i just started useing it recently and it is terrible does not soray straight and it stopped working when the bottle is still almost completely full! I would not buy this product if i were you.

reviews.headline: better setting sprays than this
reviews.comments: the spray stopped working for me and there was no way to fix it

reviews.headline: My new holy grail setting spray!
reviews.comments: This stuff is AMAZING! The ultra fine mist is so nice and my makeup looked "just applied" The. Whole. Day! I work outside in the hot desert sun, so it says a lot that I can have these results even in extreme conditions. Buy backups! Don't run out!

reviews.headline: Great finishing spray but overpriced
reviews.comments:
This is some of the best setting spray! But definitely is overpriced for the size bottle. You are getting elf needs to lower the price point on this and also offer a larger size bottle at an affordable price point! 
Make up stays put all day. Nice Dewey finish. Smells great too!

reviews.headline: love the product, hate the bottle.
reviews.comments: It works great. Keeps my blush bright all day. Wish the sprayer didn't stop working. Next time I'll buy the milani one because the bottle works great.

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: It was so good

reviews.headline: New Holy Grail
reviews.comments: I absolutely LOVE this setting spray. I had to stop using the original e.l.f. setting spray I had because my sensitive skin couldn't handle the fragrance in it, even though it did work to keep my makeup in place. I decided to try this one and I am so happy I did- it doesn't break me out, and it keeps my makeup in place all day long! I LOVE the microfine mist, too; it feels so good as you spritz it on!

reviews.headline: holy grail tbh
reviews.comments: i love the mist on her shes amazing. i use this setting spray for my makeup for dance competitions and the makeup looks AMAZING! i pair this with other elf and drugstore products so buying high end isn't necessary! right now im using the milani one and the mist difference is insane! i love the milani setting spray but their mist is a bit too heavy for me. ELF is the way to go so i will be buying that again once i run out of milani!

reviews.headline: Love her
reviews.comments: Good for the price!

reviews.headline: I like it
reviews.comments: Ive teied alot of setting aprays from high end to drug store. I bought this on a whim and tbh im glad i did! I used it the other night to set my make up before going out and everyone was complimenting me. I have dry skin, and my face stayed dewy all night. I used the haus labs foundation, laura mercier blush, refy bronzer and the kosas concealer and none of my make up lifted or seperated at the end of the night. 10/10

reviews.headline: Did they change the formula?
reviews.comments:
I got this based on all the praise for its staying power and I'm genuinely confused. Are the good reviews for an older formulation?

I have combo skin and haven't struggled with oil taking off my makeup in YEARS. This is alright for blending, hence the stars (though I think the alcohol separates concealer/foundation/etc., but that's nothing that can't be fixed with blending and powder). However, it doesn't do anything anything special for the way your makeup looks when you spray at the end (which is fine, cause it doesn't claim to). But after a few hours, my dry spots get dryer; and my makeup gets so oily that it literally transfers to ANY touch, even accidental brushes with my fingers (AND on areas where I don't usually get oily, like my cheeks). I tried using it several times, with different techniques to make sure I was giving it a chance, but I don't like it. 

Two more cons, which aren't big deals to me: 1) the spray is super fine, maybe too fine, and 2) strong scents don't bother me but the alcohol is def present (high alc content may be what made my makeup disappear/thin out/separate when I was blending??).

Overall, there's def better drugstore setting sprays out there, like Milani Make It Last or LA Girl Pro Perfect.

reviews.headline: this setting spray is good for melting makeup
reviews.comments: this setting soray is good for melting your makeup at the end of your routine. if you're looking for a setting spray thats transfer proof, this isn't the one. my intention for buying this product is because i read multiple people claim it was transfer proof. it isnt, at least not for me. the smell is also strong and the mist is extremely fine (i dont have a problem with either of these but some might).

reviews.headline: not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Do not purchase this if you have sensitive skin!!! the fragrance is way too prominent and made my skin break out due to irritation :(

reviews.headline: Doesn't set at all
reviews.comments: Don't bother using this does not set at all.

reviews.headline: Nozzle stoped working, will not buy again
reviews.comments: I love the spray but have purchased twice and nozzle stopped working a quarter of they way thru the first bottle and second bottle nozzle stopped working two thirds of they way thru.  Will not buy again.

reviews.headline: My holy grail
reviews.comments: The best affordable long lasting setting spray. After I stopped buying the all nighter spray I glued on to this one â€” this with the gripping face primer â€” my makeup is on and not going ANYWHERE for 12-14 hours!!! And it kinda smells like the MAC setting spray. The only con is that out of the 7 times that I bought this, the nozzle stopped spraying once. I had to transfer it to a different spray bottle. But this is an amazing setting spray fr! I keep repurchasing this!!!

reviews.headline: I can buy this product always.
reviews.comments: I always buy this product because, is good and I can say cheap too.

media.headline: I got hit by a car but my makeup didn't know!
I love this setting spray.
media.caption: This spray made my picture come really nice.

faceoff_positive.comments: People don't seem to read very well these days. The negative reviews about the packaging are bringing this product down when on the bottle it CLEARLY says due to the nature of the product and the ingredients, clogging will occur. Run it over hot water to clear the sprayer and remove residue and it'll be back to normal. I swear the population gets simpler and simpler as the years go on...anywho, for me this product is GREAT!! I have oily skin and I'm always looking for products to not necessarily keep me from being oily (sometimes that's inevitable) but to keep my makeup looking just applied, fresh and have it be longwearing (after blotting the oil away) This product does just that. I like to spray it in between my makeup steps for longevity and to keep my makeup from transferring so much in my mask. It does all that for me and keeps me looking great until I decide to take my makeup off. Nice cheaper alternative for the all nighter spray which I have used for years
faceoff_positive.headline: DUPE FOR ALL NIGHTER
